Mini 1521: The Fall Jake VS Slandaar


For years, Cadus has stood as the last bastion of humanity in a world fallen to evil.

Millenia ago, the world was at the peak of civilization. Great, booming cities held millions of people with law and order.

The world has changed since then, with overpopulation and war causing the world to gradually descend into chaos.

The remaining people who still held faith banded together and created the walled city of Cadus. Within its walls, they outlasted the storm.

With peace and justice as the cornerstone of their lives, Cadus's people flourished, but its sanctuary was not to last.

Years slowly crept past, darkness reached its hideous roots within the fortifications, and the death and despair once walled out seeped in.

The blood of innocents washed the streets. The screams of dying children were heard in the tenebrous gloom.

As the fall of Cadus reaches its zenith, the last thirteen people band together.

It has begun.


Rules of Anarchy:
1) All decisions come down to a democracy. The moderator gets 14 votes.
2) Please use vote tags to place your votes. Bold tags are also acceptable.
3) Lynches will occur when one player has received the majority of votes. You may post during the twilight period between the hammer and the closing of the thread.
4) If unsufficient votes are made on any player, or a majority of votes have been made to no lynch, no lynch will be made.
5) Nights will last 48 hours.
6) Do NOT quote any private communication from me, nor any mason, scum, or neighbour topics that may or may not exist. You may paraphrase, just don't copy it wholesale.
7) You MAY NOT discuss the game outside of the thread unless your role specifically gives you the ability to do so.
8) Days will last 2 weeks, or until a lynch (or no lynch) has been decided on.
9) Blue is my color. Refrain from using it.
10) Inform the mod before going V/LA. I will prod you after 48 hours of inactivity, and then again after 24 hours. At that point, I will be forced to replace you.
11) In the tragic event I drop off the face of the earth, a backup moderator will take my place.
12) In the event a deadline is reached, it will become a no lynch by default.
13) Once you die, you're dead. You are allowed one "bah!" post, but no more than one, and it must contain no game related content.
14) The rules can be arbitrarily changed/added to by one party (me) anytime I am feeling greedy and/or evil.
15) Be nice, and try to enjoy yourself.

You are a Citizen. You wish for peace and justice for all.

GreyGnarl has been lynched!





As the sun began to set, the villagers finished their protracted quarrel and decided on a lynch.

The heat of the evening sun reflected on the stone and concrete in the surrounding courtyard as Greygnarl was brought to the noose. The crowd clamoured for him to give his last words, but citing a regulation, (misinterpretation of one, at that!), he kept his head high and his mouth shut. The executioner made a final remark on the perceived lack of intelligence of those around him, berating other villagers on their conflict, and pulled the noose over Greygnarl's head. Greygnarl stood resolutely as the machinery of the gallows cranked into motion, feeling the last of the suns tranquil rays as dusk began to set, the world fading about him with a final crack.

The body of GreyGnarl fluttered in the chill twilight breeze. As the crowd began to disperse, one person checked the body. There was no knife, no guns, no badge. Nothing.

GreyGnarl was a Citizen.


Night has fallen. All actions must be received by (expired on 2013-12-10 12:00:00)

As the brutal night turned to day, the bleary eyed townspeople returned to the center, ready for another day of lynching, but they weren't the first ones there.

Lying in a pool of his own, thick blood, the townspeople found a man holding a rifle. Assuming that he was one of the enemies, the town rejoiced, but their fervor was cut short by his last words: "I'm batman."

Don_Johnson has died! He was a Compulsive Vigilante.

Further down the road, a similar sight awaited, but the victim was then already dead. Like vultures feeding off their carrion, the people searched his body. Nothing.

Alduskkel has died! He was a Citizen.

This version of Godfather, as well as the first two variations below, are considered Normal on mafiascum.net.
